title: Kalista cosplay WIP
body:
As you can see, I've completed the most important part, and now all I have left are the finishing touches and small tweaks.

**F**or reference:

[](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/3/30/Kalista_OriginalCentered.jpg)https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/51/Martial_Poise.png

My pr**o** c**o**splay:

https://i.imgur.com/9RoHr6z.png[]

Isn't it turning out grea**t**? Any other Kalista cosplayers lurking on Boards?

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
